title: Is it permissible to postpone cutting the hair after doing 'Umrah
transcript: he says that for a man is it permissible to postpone cutting the hair or shaving or uh shortening the hair after umrah in the haram or to postpone it when you reach if they both options are okay and permissible there isn't any uh specification that you should do it in haram or should do it in makkah region as long as you're still in the state of ahram you can postpone cutting your hair even a whole day without having any problem insha'allah
